node.text:
Our parks close along with the rest of our resort on April 18th because our season is ending. One thing that will never end is all the memories and friends that have been made in our terrain parks this year. From new talent emerging to our locals landing tricks that have never been done here to the @brighton_diggers making some of their best features they’ve ever come up with. March and April have made for some incredible progression in Majestic, Candyland and My Oh My. From giant gaps to extremely technical maneuvers to one footed tricks on rails you wouldn’t expect, this edit is not one to miss. You do not want to pass up the last shot of this edit, it’s a trick that will go down in our history ❤️

🏂: @cheesin.egan @gameboi_thicc @kaleahopal @morgr33n @ma_kall_u_later @_baby_kangaroo_ @inspectuhhh @lamp_shade @treyson_allen @treichelberger @phoebe_bellallen @_tropic_thunder @camper.pat 

📹: @flanellifestyles @phoebe_bellallen 

#brightonresort #slc #utah #snowboard #snowboarding

node.title: It’s Not Goodbye, It’s See You Later

node.text:
If you ride in our terrain parks long enough you become part of a tight knit family of all backgrounds and skill levels. You can cruise through them and our locals will say what’s up or if you’re trying something difficult they’ll cheer you on. This February, parts of our Brighton family went all out to film this edit. Watch the @brighton_diggers go off along with new talent from this year like @cheesin.egan and year over year mainstays like @_tropic_thunder ! Some of them learned some new tricks for this while other tried some maneuvers on some incredibly advanced features. The ender from @_baby_kangaroo_ is must see, do not let this pass you by!

🏂: @cheesin.egan @d33p.rest @salisburystefan @treyson_allen @_baby_kangaroo_ @keeganhosefros @ma_kall_u_later @_tropic_thunder @camper.pat
📹: @phoebe_bellallen @flanellifestyles 

#brightonresort #snowboard #snowboarding #utah #slc

node.text:
There is a popular saying that there is “No friends on a powder day.” That’s the direct opposite when it comes to our terrain parks, it’s all friends all of the time. Our parks this month have had some of the best tricks it’s ever seen go down in Brighton history by both year after year favorites like Tucker Brown and new riders on the rise like Caleb Kinnear and Egan Wint (you’ll want to watch for the last trick in the edit which is hers). They put a lot of hard work into this one so give it a watch and then go thank your @brighton_diggers 

🏂: @cheesin.egan @gameboi_thicc @madmads.world @_baby_kangaroo_ @damnbenny @ma_kall_u_later @morgr33n @treyson_allen @salisburystefan @cable_televisi0n @_tropic_thunder 

📹: @flanellifestyles @phoebe_bellallen 

#brightonresort #snowboard #snowboarding #slc #saltlakecity

node.title: All Friends on a Park Day

node.text:
The new generation of Brighton snowboarders are here and they are making their presence known. Riders like Egan Wint are making their mark in our terrain parks that have seen their fair share of legends emerge out of. Please enjoy all the trick insanity that went down in our terrain parks in the past few weeks from Brighton’s new talent and some of your favorite locals.

🏂: @cheesin.egan @_tropic_thunder @splifmode @madmads.world @broke__off @salisburystefan @_baby_kangaroo_ @ma_kall_u_later @gameboi_thicc 
📹: @flanellifestyles 

#brightonresort #snowboarding #snowboard #slc #saltlakecity

node.title: Next Generation (with some of your Brighton favorites thrown in)

node.text:
With the holidays fast approaching, taking the appropriate precautions to prevent the spread of COVID-19 is more important than ever. Thank you for teaming up with us to keep our resort safe and open this season, so skiing and riding can remain healthy outdoor activities that provide us all with fresh air and a much-needed escape.

#brightonresort #utah #slc #saltlakecity 

Motion Graphics: WaveBreak Media (stock.adobe.com)

node.title: Brighton Resort "Know Before You Go"  COVID-19

node.text: We’re hoping this next storm delivers the goods! In the meantime enjoy this video of @forrestshearer picking apart Brighton’s backcountry terrain. 🎥: @nickkalisz #brightonresort #jonesstratos #jonessnowboards @jonessnowboards

node.text:
It’s mid season and the terrain parks are in full swing! Check out our park locals as they hit some of our more complex features and show off what they’re made of.
#brightonresort
📹: @flanellifestyles 🏂: @treyson_allen @_tropic_thunder @ma_kall_u_later @salisburystefan @bigbaddoodoodaddi999
@potagucci 
Thanks: @dangshades @dinosaurs_will_die @gnusnowboards @nichesnowboards

node.text:
If it was the middle of the season and the snow was falling, what lift would you head to first? ❄️

#brightonresort #utah #slc #saltlakecity #bigcottonwoodcanyon

node.text:
Next season is right around the corner and we need you! We are hiring for a wide variety of positions from lifties to guest services to ski patrol and more! If snow is your life and you want to always be around the ski/snowboard community please feel free to apply! Hit the link in the bio to see what opportunities we have for you 🥳

📸: @thevillagewolf @ak_snap 

#brightonresort #utah #slc #saltlakecity #bigcottonwoodcanyon

node.text:
We have a new “Welcome to Brighton” sign that you can check out by the Brighton store! We love this new sign that welcomes you to our resort as soon as you turn in. We owe a huge thank you to Emily Adams for creating this sign for us! We hope you all grab a picture by our new sign!

🎨🖥: @garphicdesigner 

#brightonresort #utah #welcome #slc #bigcottonwoodcanyon

node.text:
It’s International Friendship Day and there is nothing better than riding with your friends. Everything up here is better with your friends whether it’s a powder day, a session in the park or you’re carving on some groomers together. Tag your friends come up here with to let them know how much you love riding with them!

📹🏂: @melissariitano @madmads.world @kelseyboyer @ak_snap 

#brightonresort #friends #friendship #slc #bestfriends

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Brighton Resort on July 31, 2021 tagging @womens.epic. May be an image of 1 person, standing and outdoors.

node.text:
Today’s Women’s Epic Race was one of our favorite events of the summer season! Utah’s first women’s only trail race series, the @womens.epic race is definitely one of a kind! Thanks to all of the people behind the Women’s Epic and to all of those that participated! Congratulations to @ellieworun on her first place finish and to all of the other competitors!

📸: @captainwinkler

node.text:
Bring on the monsoon, we’re ready for it 🤿🌧

👋: @flanellifestyles 
📹: @lamp_shade 

#brightonresort #slc #rain #storm #utah

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Brighton Resort on July 27, 2021 tagging @brighton_diggers. May be an image of outdoors.

node.text:
Our terrain parks are some of our favorite areas of resort. Seeing people cheer each other on while they try new tricks or ride in a gang of friends from My Oh My to Lower Majestic, it all makes us incredibly happy. With that in mind, the @brighton_diggers need your help. What type of features do you want to see at our resort this year? We want to hear anything and everything from box combinations, to transition elements to full on newly built rails. Let’s hear what you have in mind 🤔💡

📸: @treyson_allen 

#brightonresort #utah #slc #bigcottonwoodcanyon #saltlakecity
